A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
While the last Jedi movie was better than the force awakens\, and had better creative choices and storytelling\, this movie makes it feel like the original star wars movies led no where and accomplished nothing.  It's ashame Disney feels it necessary to kill off all the original characters. 
The movies feel like they're just copying similar plotlines from original movies. An empire and a rebellion. We never get to see the Jedi order fully restored\, they're always hanging on by one person.
Also didn't like how they handled Luke Skywalker. We never really get to see him in a role as a Jedi master. They made him a hermit\, gave him a very brief come back\, then remove him from the story to reprise in the future as a ghost. Not a fitting role....
Also felt too much like the empire strikes back
